    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vampire Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=5717) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=750" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You were raised by your vampiric parent, or you've invested substantial time and energy researching the secrets of your undead progenitors. You're trained in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) and [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

 You also gain the [Additional Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=5114) general feat for [Vampire Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41).
name: Vampire Lore
